metadata.title: Does the Touch MCU Have a Shield Function?

sections.content:
Question:
Are 2nd generation touch key technology MCUs equipped with a shielding function (also called active shield, guard, etc.)?
Answer:
The second generation does not have an active shield function.
In the third-generation CTSU2, an active-shield function has been added to the self-capacitance method.
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
